title: Land for sale in Nuwaraeliya
details: This land is boarded to Haggala botanical garden and 125 meeters to Nuwaraeliya Badulla A5 main road. Surrounded by mind blowing mountains. 10 minutes (7km) to Nuwaraeliya town. 500m to Haggala botanical garden. Very clean "sinnakkara" sole proprietor deeds. Best place to build tourist hotel or holiday bungalow. Over 50-100 perches are willing to sell. 185 perches available. Per perch price 350,000/= (No interested for Brokers)
